timeline.bodyText: I don't get what was the purpose of this line?
timeline.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText:
This checks if battery is 100%.
I assume that on some strange devices charging state is not shown correct and therefore 100% is assumed as "ongoing charging".
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky

timeline.message:
Remove Evernote job scheduler dependency

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

timeline.bodyText:
I renamed the isInernetWalled() API.
We could have perfect internet connectivity but the server could be in maintenance mode, which this API checks as well. So he name referring to a "walled garden" probably went past it's shelf live at some point, so I renamed it.
timeline.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText: Nope, changing semantics from "it is" to "it is not" wasn't a terrific idea after all...
replies.author: ezaquarii

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/nextcloud/client/network/ConnectivityService.java b/src/main/java/com/nextcloud/client/network/ConnectivityService.java
index ba2984527..b12f72778 100644
--- a/src/main/java/com/nextcloud/client/network/ConnectivityService.java
+++ b/src/main/java/com/nextcloud/client/network/ConnectivityService.java

@@ -31,9 +31,9 @@ public interface ConnectivityService {
      * Since this call involves network traffic, it should not be called
      * on a main thread.
      *
-     * @return True if server is reachable and operational, false otherwise
+     * @return True if server is unreachable, false otherwise
      */
-    boolean isServerAvailable();
+    boolean isInternetWalled();
 
     /**
      * Get current network connectivity status.

timeline.bodyText: This was confusing status... Having those flags in that varying form made simple "connected" statate quite unintuitive to figure out. Connectivity gives one a simpler answer.
timeline.author: ezaquarii
